name: Hill Racing (NapTech Games)
description:
Play Online Classic Hill Climb Racing! Race Your Way up Hill in This Physics Based Driving Game!

With Mad Racing: Hill Climb, you can enjoy a classic vertical-scrolling driving game that's easy and casual. You'll race your way up hills in this physics based game and try to outdo your opponents in order to become the best! There are vehicles to choose from, including a motocross bike, monster truck, tractor, hippie van, one wheeler, quad bike, tourist bus, race car, police car, ambulance, fire truck, and many more!
